full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYI 'BUM BSANGS BEEd'U RYA'I SNGON MO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

KYIS, DPAL BSAM YAS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I TSE, LHA SRIN LDE BRGYAD LA SOGS PA NAG PHYOGS PA RNAMS KYI 'DUL BA'I CHED DU MDZAD PA, DE'I RJES SU GANGS CAN BOD KYI SA LA NAD RIMS DANG DAL YAMS NAD DANG RIMS TSAD LA SOGS PA LTAS NGAN PA MTSAN MA GYUR BA LA, BTZON PA 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYI LAR KLUNGS KYI STOD LA 'DI DAG GIS @025B ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI MCHOG GO SNYAM PA'I BA DANG, PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO'I BDE SKYID LDAN TSE SROG DBANG THANG BSOD NAMS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,SMRAS PA, 'JAM DBYANGS MGRIN 'KHYUD MKHAS PA'I DBANG, ,BRTZE CHEN PHYAG NA BAD DKAR TSUL, ,MTHU STOBS
